metadata.title: CVE-2017-5039 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
A use after free in PDFium in Google Chrome prior to 57.0.2987.98 for Mac,Windows, and Linux and 57.0.2987.108 for Android allowed a remote attackerto potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted PDF file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-5039` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

chromium-browser - 57.0.2987.98-0ubuntu0.16.04.1276
chromium-browser-l10n - 57.0.2987.98-0ubuntu0.16.04.1276
chromium-chromedriver - 57.0.2987.98-0ubuntu0.16.04.1276
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg - 57.0.2987.98-0ubuntu0.16.04.1276
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg-extra - 57.0.2987.98-0ubuntu0.16.04.1276
No subscription required

criterions.comment: chromium-browser package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '57.0.2987.98-0ubuntu0.16.04.1276').
